interface.name: org_kde_kwin_appmenu_manager
interface.description: This interface allows a client to link a window (or wl_surface) to an com.canonical.dbusmenu interface registered on DBus.

event.name: available
event.description:
Indicates whether there is a global application menu. An application could use this information to hide its menubar.
This event will be sent after binding the global or when the availability of the global menu changes later on.

interface.name: org_kde_kwin_appmenu
interface.description: The DBus service name and object path where the appmenu interface is present The object should be registered on the session bus before sending this request. If not applicable, clients should remove this object.

request.name: set_address

description.summary: initialise or update the location of the AppMenu interface

request.description: Set or update the service name and object path. Strings should be formatted in Latin-1 matching the relevant DBus specifications.
